parameters.name: BstrMateReferenceName
parameters.description: Name of mate reference

parameters.name: PrimaryReferenceEntity
parameters.description: Pointer to the primary mate, the IEntity object

parameters.name: PrimaryReferenceType
parameters.description: Primary mate's reference type as defined by swMateReferenceType_e

parameters.name: PrimaryReferenceAlignment
parameters.description: Primary mate's reference alignment type as defined swMateReferenceAlignment_e

parameters.name: PrimaryReferenceAlignAxes
parameters.description: True to align with the axes of the coordinate system or origin when forming a mate, false to not

parameters.name: SecondaryReferenceEntity
parameters.description: Pointer to the secondary mate, the IEntity object

parameters.name: SecondaryReferenceType
parameters.description: Secondary mate's reference type as defined by swMateReferenceType_e

parameters.name: SecondaryReferenceAlignment
parameters.description: Secondary mate's alignment type as defined swMateReferenceAlignment_e

parameters.name: SecondaryReferenceAlignAxes
parameters.description: True to align with the axes of the coordinate system or origin when forming a mate, false to not

parameters.name: TertiaryReferenceEntity
parameters.description: Pointer to the tertiary mate, the IEntity object

parameters.name: TertiaryReferenceType
parameters.description: Tertiary mate's reference type as defined by swMateReferenceType_e

parameters.name: TertiaryReferenceAlignment
parameters.description: Tertiary mate's reference alignment as defined by swMateReferenceAlignment_e

title: IFeatureManager.InsertMateReference2
description: Inserts a mate reference for a part or assembly document.
